name: Stealth Squad
description:
Made in a week for the 56th Weekly Game Jam!

Race against the clock in a stealth-based puzzler! You'll need to use Alpha, Beta, and Gamma's unique abilities together to succeed.

Controls:

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Pause - Spacebar
  • Select / Swap - X
  • Back / Cancel - Z

MORE LEVELS COMING SOON!
